purpose: Standardize the verifiable artifact generated by AHRS analysis prior to execution.

fields.name: Remediation_ID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the specific remediation instance.

fields.name: Root_Cause_Ref
fields.description: Reference hash of the AHRS-TRC-01 RootCauseAnalysisReport.

fields.name: Instructions
fields.description: A sequential list of execution steps (rollback, patching, configuration updates).

fields.name: Validation_Proof_Target
fields.description: The expected cryptographic state validation proof after successful application of the plan.

fields.name: Signoff_Confirmed
fields.description: Flag indicating mandatory actor signoff (AHRS-RCM-03) has been secured.
